name: svg-themer
description: Apply a theme to SVG elements as well as image data and css rules constructed from SVG markup

scripts.build: mkdir umd 2>/dev/null; cp index.js umd/svg-themer.js; uglifyjs index.js > umd/svg-themer.min.js; ls -lah umd/*.*
scripts.test: http-server -p 49867 -o index.html # -o is not working for me

author: Jonathan Eiten <jonathan.eiten@mojotouch.com>
